title: Ping rise today?
body:
Its a little strange, but for some reason I gained 30 ping in NA today.
before today: https://i.gyazo.com/50b227d7e2c01bac4ace5d143e570dda.png
today: https://i.gyazo.com/af245e044dd25d0a99da6e2434ee4d93.png

I checked downloads, voice comms, did pingtests, speedtests and the like but all seem the same.

Usually my ping in LAN is around 16-21 but today: https://i.gyazo.com/077747e8321fc13fbc0c9e0dd0ceb0cf.png

Is it just me?

replies.body:
I found a temporary fix using wtfast but that's a paid service (has a free trial i'm using). From what I've seen with this problem rarely is there an easy fix.

Are you using fibre?
Are you through Xfinity? I am, had the same problem today

You may be having issues with your network or even how your ISP is routing to the game server, which can cause a consistent increase in your ping.  As a first step I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any local possibilities.  If that doesn't resolve the issue, don't worry and let me know!

I just made a thread about this, I can confirm, my last game, I was DCed from your end in the first 3 minutes of the game, I reconnected, and my ping went from a constant 20 to a constant 48. It is not us, it is you guys. I checked my internet at the time of the incident, and after, my end checks out.
You are not alone, I'm experiencing this exact thing and it's making the game completely unplayable.
I have been getting that a lot too. went from 40 ping to 67
Same's been happening to me for a few months. Submitted a ticket but it ended in a dead end. Let me know if anything changes for you.
